support_button.title: Support Me
support_button.description: Encore Tweaks is, and always will be, free for you, and everyone. You can however show me that you care by making a donation.

learn_encore.title: Learn Encore
learn_encore.description: Learn how to use Encore Tweaks and its features.

lite_mode.title: Enforce Lite Mode
lite_mode.description: Enable Lite Mode by default for all games

device_mitigation.title: Device Mitigation
device_mitigation.description: Mitigate device specific issues on Encore Tweaks

log_level.title: Log Level
log_level.description: Choose how detailed the Encore Tweaks operational log should be

create_shortcut.title: Create Shortcut
create_shortcut.description: Create a home screen shortcut for quick access to Encore Tweaks

game_settings.title: Game Settings
game_settings.lite_mode_description: Optimize for longer battery life over peak performance
game_settings.dnd_mode_description: Block notifications and calls while gaming

lite_mode.title: Lite Mode
lite_mode.brief: Lite mode reduces overheating and power consumption during gameplay by lowering CPU and component frequencies. This setting applies to all games when enabled.

device_mitigation.title: Device Mitigation
device_mitigation.brief: Device mitigation disables potentially incompatible tweaks for specific devices. Keep it disabled unless you have problems.

cpu_governor.title: CPU Governor
cpu_governor.default_description: Applied to balanced and performance profiles when lite mode is active
cpu_governor.powersave_description: Exclusively used for the powersave profile
cpu_governor.brief: CPU governor is an algorithm that dynamically adjusts the processor's frequency in real time, directly affecting system performance and power consumtion.

modal.performance_warning: Setting the governor to performance will cause overheating and rapid battery drain. Are you sure you want to proceed?

toast.reboot_to_apply: Reboot your device to apply changes.
toast.shortcut_unavailable: No API available for this feature, use WebUI X to use this feature.
